channel.title: Fully Working Barrows Development
channel.description:
Base is Delta (Chaospkers version 1)
Barrows Underground = Complete
Save Kills on logout = Complete
Dig on hills = Complete
Working npcs = Complete
Npc only attacks person who clicked on chest = Not started (Not even aggressive)
Npc text over head = Not started
Hidden Tunnels = Complete
Npc Correct health = Complete
Full Rewards + Random amounts of Gold, and runes = Complete (Credits to Tatemo and _tm)
Automatically teleported out after receiving reward = Completed 7/26/09
Npc occasionally hits through prayer = Not started
Kill Count Amount show on screen = Started slightly
Npc correct block/attack emotes = 50% done
Please ignore my very crappy client I am using.
Ahrims - Bad block emote lol [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/1ahrims.jpg[/img]
Verac - Hits through prayer, correct emotes [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/1verac.jpg[/img]
Dharok - Right attack emote [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/1dharok.jpg[/img]
Karils - Now does hit if prayer is not on [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/1karil.jpg[/img]
Torags [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/1torag.jpg[/img]
Guthans + the chest! [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/1guthanchest.jpg[/img]
Random Hidden Tunnels, the message text has typos, but I'll fix it [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/1hiddentunnel.jpg[/img]
Reward (Needs work) Thank you Tatemo and _tm in the help section! [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/1reward.jpg[/img]
Automatically teleported after receiving reward/ fixed up rewards [img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/barrows-1.jpg[/img]
I will be working on this for a few hours tomorrow, so look forward to more.

item.title: Fully Working Barrows Development
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“raped by who, post:31, topic:290976”]Moparscape forums = full of PMS’ing noobs

This takes a max of 60 minutes free-written, and theres been over 20 tutorials on various websites for this.[/quote]This has taken me over 4 hours of work, getting it glitch free, for what I’ve done. And tutorials, so what? I didn’t use them, so I don’t give a shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Fully Working Barrows Development
item.dc:creator: @G0ds_Arr0w0s G0ds Arr0w0s
item.description:
@G0ds_Arr0w0s wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:20, topic:290976”][quote author=G0ds Arr0w0s link=topic=384676.msg2896634#msg2896634 date=1249253400]
“Nothing special sigh”
[/quote]Nope, it isn’t. I did it just for fun. I have no good ideas lately. Plus it’s never going to be “special” it’s barrows, which is simple for the most part.[/quote]

So very true, and I was just playing with ya.

Read full topic

item.title: Fully Working Barrows Development
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“2012 || Ben, post:28, topic:290976”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=384676.msg2898113#msg2898113 date=1249341583]

Heres my barrows. It’s like 90%?

[code] /**
* Class Barrows
*
* Handles barrows : Version 2.4
*
* 14:47 23/07/2009
*
* Copyright notice
*/

public class Barrows {

public void resetBarrowsVars() { 
	killedKarils = false; killedGuthans = false; killedDharok = false; 
	killedTorag = false; killedAhrims = false; killedVeracs = false;
}

    public void spawnAnNpc(int npcID, int X, int Y, int heightLevel) {
	server.npcHandler.spawnAnNpc(npcID, X, Y, heightLevel, X+5, Y+5, X+5, Y+5, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false, c.playerId);
    }

public int barrowReward() {
	return barrowReward[(int) (Math.random() * barrowReward.length)];
	}

public int randomRunes() {
	return Runes[(int) (Math.random() * Runes.length)];
}

public int Runes[] = {
	560,565,561,558,563,562
};

	public int barrowReward[] = {
	4708, 4710, 4712, 4714, 4716, 4718, 4720, 4722,
	4724, 4726, 4728, 4730, 4732, 4734, 4736, 4738,
	4745, 4747, 4749, 4751, 4753, 4755, 4757, 4759,
	1149
};

public void writeBarrowsI(boolean show) 
{
	if(show) {
		c.setInterfaceWalkable(4535);
		c.sendQuest("Kill Count: "+barrowsMGKC, 4536);
		miniMap(2);
	} else {
		c.setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
		c.killMyNPCs();
		miniMap(0);
	}
{

public void finishBarrows() 
{
	resetBarrowsVars();
   	barrowsMGKC = 0;
   	shakeScreen(300);
}

public static boolean isBarrowNpc(int npc) 
{
	switch (npc) {
		case 2025: case 2026: 
		case 2027: case 2028: 
		case 2029: case 2030:
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public static void killedBarrowNpc(int npc)
{
	switch (npc) {

		case 2025: killedAhrims = true; break;
		case 2026: killedDharok = true; break;
		case 2027: killedGuthans = true; break;
		case 2028: killedKarils = true; break;
		case 2029: killedTorag = true; break;
		case 2030: killedVeracs = true; break;
	}
}

/**
 *spawnLastBrother
 * X and Y coords are wrong.
 */

public void spawnLastBrother(int d) 
{
	if(!killedVeracs) {
		spawnAnNpc(2030, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedAhrims) {
		spawnAnNpc(2025, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedTorag) {
		spawnAnNpc(2029, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedKarils) {
		spawnAnNpc(2028, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedGuthans) {
		spawnAnNpc(2027, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedDharok) {
		spawnAnNpc(2026, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[d];
}

public void displayHiddenTunnel() 
{
	if(dialogue == 0) {
		sendFrame164(363);
		sendQuest("", 364);
		sendQuest("You've found the hidden tunnel, do you want to enter.", 365);
		sendQuest("", 366);
		dialogue++;
		displayHiddenTunnel();
	} else {
		sendFrame164(2459);
		sendQuest("Yeah I'm fearless!", 2461);
		sendQuest("No way, that looks scary!", 2462);
		dialogue == 0;
	}
}

public void shakeScreen(int l) 
{
	c.outStream.createFrame(35);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
}

	public void miniMap(int i) 
{
	c.outStream.createFrame(99);
	c.outStream.writeByte(i);
	}

public boolean inCoords(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) 
{
	return c.absX >= x && c.absX <= x2 && c.absY >= y && c.absY <= y2
}

	public void Teleport(int id, int id2, int hight) 
{
	c.teleportToX = id; 
	c.teleportToY = id2; 
	c.heightLevel = hight;
        	c.ResetAttack(); 
	c.ResetAttackNPC(); 
	}

public void spadeTeleport(String t) 
{
   	if (t.equals("Veracs")) {
		Teleport(3578, 9706, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Dharok")) {
		Teleport(3556, 9718, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Ahrims")) {
		Teleport(3557, 9703, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Karils")) {
		Teleport(3546, 9684, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Guthans")) {
		Teleport(3534, 9704, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Torags")) {
		Teleport(3568, 9683, 3);
	}
	writeBarrowsI(true);
	}

public void spawnBrother(String b) 
{
	if(b.contains("Karils")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2028, 3549, 9683, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Dharoks")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2026, 3556, 9716, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Guthans")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2027, 3537, 9703, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Torags")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2029, 3568, 9685, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Ahrims")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2025, 3557, 9701, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Veracs")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2030, 3575, 9705, 3);
	}
	sendNPcText = true;
	c.sendMessage("You woken up the ancient beast!");
}

public void spade(int spade, int wdf, int p)  
{
	switch (spade) 
	{

	case 952:
		if(inCoords(3554, 3294, 3560, 3300)) {
			spadeTeleport("Veracs");
		} else if(inCoords(3573, 3295, 3578, 3300)) {
			spadeTeleport("Dharok"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3563, 3285, 3567, 3291)) {
			spadeTeleport("Ahrims");
		} else if(inCoords(3563, 3273, 3568, 3278)) {
			spadeTeleport("Karils"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3575, 3280, 3580, 3284)) {
			spadeTeleport("Guthans"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3551, 3280, 3556, 3285)) {
			spadeTeleport("Torags"); 
		}
		c.startAnimation(830);
		c.updateRequired = true;
		c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void chest(int object, int p) 
{
	switch (object) 
	{

	case 10284:
	if(barrowsMGKC > 5) {
		if(misc.random(5) == 1) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(400));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(600));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(10000));
		} else if(misc.random(5) == 2) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(700));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(100));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(3000));
	    		c.addItem(barrowReward(), 1);
		} else if(misc.random(5) == 3) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(20));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(300));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(900));
	    		c.addItem(barrowReward(), 1);
 		} else {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(900));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(1200));
	    		c.addItem(4740, misc.random(600));
	 		}
			finishBarrows();
		} else { 
			spawnLastBrother(p); 
		}
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void barrowDoors(int object, int p) 
{

	if(randomInterface >= 5) {
		c.showInterface(4543);
		randomInterface = 0;
	}

	switch (object) {

	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void barrowObjects(int object, int p) 
{
	chest(object, p); barrowDoors(object, p);

	switch (object) {

	case 6702: Teleport(3565, 3289, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6703: Teleport(3575, 3298, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 
	case 6704: Teleport(3577, 3283, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6705: Teleport(3565, 3276, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 
	case 6706: Teleport(3553, 3282, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6707: Teleport(3556, 3298, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 

	case 6823: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) {
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedVeracs) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedVeracs) { 
			spawnBrother("Veracs");
		}
		break;

	case 6821: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedAhrims) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedAhrims) {
			spawnBrother("Ahrims");
		}
		break;

	case 6772: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedTorag) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedTorag) {
			spawnBrother("Torags");
		}
		break;

	case 6822: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedKarils) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedKarils) {
			spawnBrother("Karils");
		}
		break;

	case 6773: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedGuthans) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedGuthans) {
			spawnBrother("Guthans");
		}
		break;

	case 6771: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel();
		} else if(killedDharok) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedDharok) {
			spawnBrother("Dharok");
		}
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public client c;
public int dialogue = 0;
	public int barrowsMGKC, randomInterface;
public boolean sendNPcText;
	public boolean killedKarils, killedGuthans, killedDharok, killedTorag, killedAhrims, killedVeracs;

}[/code]
[/quote]If that is really yours, why did you just post it?

  1. I don’t want it?
  2. People are gonna leech your code now…

I’ve already released it on r00nserver, and it’s old, not full, and you wont get it to work correctly because I havn’t added all the methods needed.

I don’t care.

And yes it is my. Extranjeros Maton on r00nserver aka 2012.
EDIT: You don’t get barrow gloves from Barrows minigame, look in my class barrows, that’s the rewards you really only get…[/quote]Ok, I took that before you said that anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Fully Working Barrows Development
item.dc:creator: @2012_Ben 2012 || Ben
item.description:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:25, topic:290976”][quote author=2012 || Ben link=topic=384676.msg2897328#msg2897328 date=1249294516]

public class Barrows {

	}
{

public void finishBarrows()

	resetBarrowsVars();
   	barrowsMGKC = 0;
   	shakeScreen(300);
}

public static boolean isBarrowNpc(int npc) 
{
	switch (npc) {
		case 2025: case 2026: 
		case 2027: case 2028: 
		case 2029: case 2030:
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public static void killedBarrowNpc(int npc)

	switch (npc) {

	} else if(!killedTorag) {

	} else if(!killedKarils) {

	} else if(!killedGuthans) {

}

public void displayHiddenTunnel() 
{
	if(dialogue == 0) {
		sendFrame164(363);
		sendQuest("", 364);
		sendQuest("You've found the hidden tunnel, do you want to enter.", 365);
		sendQuest("", 366);
		dialogue++;
		displayHiddenTunnel();
	} else {
		sendFrame164(2459);
		sendQuest("Yeah I'm fearless!", 2461);
		sendQuest("No way, that looks scary!", 2462);
		dialogue == 0;
	}
}

public void shakeScreen(int l) 
{
	c.outStream.createFrame(35);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
}

	public void miniMap(int i) 
{
	c.outStream.createFrame(99);
	c.outStream.writeByte(i);
	}

public boolean inCoords(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) 
{
	return c.absX >= x && c.absX <= x2 && c.absY >= y && c.absY <= y2
}

	public void Teleport(int id, int id2, int hight) 
{
	c.teleportToX = id; 
	c.teleportToY = id2; 
	c.heightLevel = hight;
        	c.ResetAttack(); 
	c.ResetAttackNPC(); 
	}

public void spadeTeleport(String t) 
{
   	if (t.equals("Veracs")) {
		Teleport(3578, 9706, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Dharok")) {
		Teleport(3556, 9718, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Ahrims")) {
		Teleport(3557, 9703, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Karils")) {
		Teleport(3546, 9684, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Guthans")) {
		Teleport(3534, 9704, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Torags")) {

	}
	writeBarrowsI(true);
	}

{
	if(b.contains("Karils")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2028, 3549, 9683, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Dharoks")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2026, 3556, 9716, 3);

		spawnAnNpc(2027, 3537, 9703, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Torags")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2029, 3568, 9685, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Ahrims")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2025, 3557, 9701, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Veracs")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2030, 3575, 9705, 3);
	}
	sendNPcText = true;
	c.sendMessage("You woken up the ancient beast!");
}

{
	switch (spade) 
	{

	case 952:
		if(inCoords(3554, 3294, 3560, 3300)) {
			spadeTeleport("Veracs");
		} else if(inCoords(3573, 3295, 3578, 3300)) {

		c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		break;

	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void chest(int object, int p) 
{
	switch (object) 
	{

	case 10284:
	if(barrowsMGKC > 5) {
		if(misc.random(5) == 1) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(400));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(600));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(10000));
		} else if(misc.random(5) == 2) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(700));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(100));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(3000));
	    		c.addItem(barrowReward(), 1);
		} else if(misc.random(5) == 3) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(20));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(300));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(900));
	    		c.addItem(barrowReward(), 1);
 		} else {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(900));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(1200));
	    		c.addItem(4740, misc.random(600));
	 		}
			finishBarrows();
		} else { 
			spawnLastBrother(p); 
		}
		break;

	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void barrowDoors(int object, int p) 
{

	if(randomInterface >= 5) {
		c.showInterface(4543);
		randomInterface = 0;
	}

	switch (object) {

	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void barrowObjects(int object, int p) 
{
	chest(object, p); barrowDoors(object, p);

	switch (object) {

	case 6702: Teleport(3565, 3289, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6703: Teleport(3575, 3298, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 
	case 6704: Teleport(3577, 3283, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6705: Teleport(3565, 3276, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 
	case 6706: Teleport(3553, 3282, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6707: Teleport(3556, 3298, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 

	case 6823: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) {
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedVeracs) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedVeracs) { 
			spawnBrother("Veracs");
		}
		break;

	case 6821: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedAhrims) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedAhrims) {
			spawnBrother("Ahrims");
		}
		break;

	case 6772: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedTorag) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedTorag) {
			spawnBrother("Torags");
		}
		break;

	case 6822: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedKarils) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedKarils) {
			spawnBrother("Karils");
		}
		break;

	case 6773: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedGuthans) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedGuthans) {
			spawnBrother("Guthans");
		}
		break;

	case 6771: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel();
		} else if(killedDharok) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedDharok) {
			spawnBrother("Dharok");
		}
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public client c;
public int dialogue = 0;
	public int barrowsMGKC, randomInterface;
public boolean sendNPcText;
	public boolean killedKarils, killedGuthans, killedDharok, killedTorag, killedAhrims, killedVeracs;

}[/code]
[/quote]If that is really yours, why did you just post it?

  1. I don’t want it?
  2. People are gonna leech your code now…[/quote]

I’ve already released it on r00nserver, and it’s old, not full, and you wont get it to work correctly because I havn’t added all the methods needed.

I don’t care.

And yes it is my. Extranjeros Maton on r00nserver aka 2012.
EDIT: You don’t get barrow gloves from Barrows minigame, look in my class barrows, that’s the rewards you really only get…

item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“faded vision, post:26, topic:290976”]Random tunnel doors?
Puzzle?
Killcount?
Random pray drop head thing pops up? you would know what im talking about if you had played barrows on rs.
Screen shaking crap and map blacking.

Suggestions for fully working.

It would be special if it was exactly like runescape.

Here:

//Puzzle
                sendFrame246(4545, 250, ITEMID);
        	sendFrame126("NAME", 4553);
        	sendFrame246(4546, 250, ITEMID);
        	sendFrame126("NAME", 4554);
        	sendFrame246(4547, 250, ITEMID);
        	sendFrame126("NAME", 4555);
        	sendFrame246(4548, 250, ITEMID);
        	sendFrame126("NAME", 4556);
        	sendFrame246(4550, 250, ITEMID);
        	sendFrame246(4551, 250, ITEMID);
        	sendFrame246(4552, 250, ITEMID);
		showInterface(4543);

//killcount

sendQuest("Kill Count: ", 4536);
//Shakingframes or somit

	public static void sendFrame35(int l)
	{
			outStream.createFrame(35);
			outStream.writeByte(l);
			outStream.writeByte(l);
			outStream.writeByte(l);
			c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	}

    	public void sendFrame99(int i) {
			outStream.createFrame(99);
			outStream.writeByte(i);
    	}

item.title: Fully Working Barrows Development
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“2012 || Ben, post:24, topic:290976”]Heres my barrows. It’s like 90%?

[code] /**
* Class Barrows
*
* Handles barrows : Version 2.4
*
* 14:47 23/07/2009
*
* Copyright notice
*/

public class Barrows {

public void resetBarrowsVars() { 
	killedKarils = false; killedGuthans = false; killedDharok = false; 
	killedTorag = false; killedAhrims = false; killedVeracs = false;
}

    public void spawnAnNpc(int npcID, int X, int Y, int heightLevel) {
	server.npcHandler.spawnAnNpc(npcID, X, Y, heightLevel, X+5, Y+5, X+5, Y+5, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false, c.playerId);
    }

public int barrowReward() {
	return barrowReward[(int) (Math.random() * barrowReward.length)];
	}

public int randomRunes() {
	return Runes[(int) (Math.random() * Runes.length)];
}

public int Runes[] = {
	560,565,561,558,563,562
};

	public int barrowReward[] = {
	4708, 4710, 4712, 4714, 4716, 4718, 4720, 4722,
	4724, 4726, 4728, 4730, 4732, 4734, 4736, 4738,
	4745, 4747, 4749, 4751, 4753, 4755, 4757, 4759,
	1149
};

public void writeBarrowsI(boolean show) 
{
	if(show) {
		c.setInterfaceWalkable(4535);
		c.sendQuest("Kill Count: "+barrowsMGKC, 4536);
		miniMap(2);
	} else {
		c.setInterfaceWalkable(-1);
		c.killMyNPCs();
		miniMap(0);
	}
{

public void finishBarrows() 
{
	resetBarrowsVars();
   	barrowsMGKC = 0;
   	shakeScreen(300);
}

public static boolean isBarrowNpc(int npc) 
{
	switch (npc) {
		case 2025: case 2026: 
		case 2027: case 2028: 
		case 2029: case 2030:
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

public static void killedBarrowNpc(int npc)
{
	switch (npc) {

		case 2025: killedAhrims = true; break;
		case 2026: killedDharok = true; break;
		case 2027: killedGuthans = true; break;
		case 2028: killedKarils = true; break;
		case 2029: killedTorag = true; break;
		case 2030: killedVeracs = true; break;
	}
}

/**
 *spawnLastBrother
 * X and Y coords are wrong.
 */

public void spawnLastBrother(int d) 
{
	if(!killedVeracs) {
		spawnAnNpc(2030, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedAhrims) {
		spawnAnNpc(2025, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedTorag) {
		spawnAnNpc(2029, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedKarils) {
		spawnAnNpc(2028, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedGuthans) {
		spawnAnNpc(2027, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	} else if(!killedDharok) {
		spawnAnNpc(2026, c.absX, c.absY, 0);
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[d];
}

public void displayHiddenTunnel() 
{
	if(dialogue == 0) {
		sendFrame164(363);
		sendQuest("", 364);
		sendQuest("You've found the hidden tunnel, do you want to enter.", 365);
		sendQuest("", 366);
		dialogue++;
		displayHiddenTunnel();
	} else {
		sendFrame164(2459);
		sendQuest("Yeah I'm fearless!", 2461);
		sendQuest("No way, that looks scary!", 2462);
		dialogue == 0;
	}
}

public void shakeScreen(int l) 
{
	c.outStream.createFrame(35);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
	c.outStream.writeByte(l);
}

	public void miniMap(int i) 
{
	c.outStream.createFrame(99);
	c.outStream.writeByte(i);
	}

public boolean inCoords(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) 
{
	return c.absX >= x && c.absX <= x2 && c.absY >= y && c.absY <= y2
}

	public void Teleport(int id, int id2, int hight) 
{
	c.teleportToX = id; 
	c.teleportToY = id2; 
	c.heightLevel = hight;
        	c.ResetAttack(); 
	c.ResetAttackNPC(); 
	}

public void spadeTeleport(String t) 
{
   	if (t.equals("Veracs")) {
		Teleport(3578, 9706, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Dharok")) {
		Teleport(3556, 9718, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Ahrims")) {
		Teleport(3557, 9703, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Karils")) {
		Teleport(3546, 9684, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Guthans")) {
		Teleport(3534, 9704, 3);
	} else if (t.equals("Torags")) {
		Teleport(3568, 9683, 3);
	}
	writeBarrowsI(true);
	}

public void spawnBrother(String b) 
{
	if(b.contains("Karils")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2028, 3549, 9683, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Dharoks")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2026, 3556, 9716, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Guthans")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2027, 3537, 9703, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Torags")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2029, 3568, 9685, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Ahrims")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2025, 3557, 9701, 3);
	} else if(b.contains("Veracs")) {
		spawnAnNpc(2030, 3575, 9705, 3);
	}
	sendNPcText = true;
	c.sendMessage("You woken up the ancient beast!");
}

public void spade(int spade, int wdf, int p)  
{
	switch (spade) 
	{

	case 952:
		if(inCoords(3554, 3294, 3560, 3300)) {
			spadeTeleport("Veracs");
		} else if(inCoords(3573, 3295, 3578, 3300)) {
			spadeTeleport("Dharok"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3563, 3285, 3567, 3291)) {
			spadeTeleport("Ahrims");
		} else if(inCoords(3563, 3273, 3568, 3278)) {
			spadeTeleport("Karils"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3575, 3280, 3580, 3284)) {
			spadeTeleport("Guthans"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3551, 3280, 3556, 3285)) {
			spadeTeleport("Torags"); 
		}
		c.startAnimation(830);
		c.updateRequired = true;
		c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void chest(int object, int p) 
{
	switch (object) 
	{

	case 10284:
	if(barrowsMGKC > 5) {
		if(misc.random(5) == 1) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(400));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(600));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(10000));
		} else if(misc.random(5) == 2) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(700));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(100));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(3000));
	    		c.addItem(barrowReward(), 1);
		} else if(misc.random(5) == 3) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(20));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(300));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(900));
	    		c.addItem(barrowReward(), 1);
 		} else {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(900));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(1200));
	    		c.addItem(4740, misc.random(600));
	 		}
			finishBarrows();
		} else { 
			spawnLastBrother(p); 
		}
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void barrowDoors(int object, int p) 
{

	if(randomInterface >= 5) {
		c.showInterface(4543);
		randomInterface = 0;
	}

	switch (object) {

	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void barrowObjects(int object, int p) 
{
	chest(object, p); barrowDoors(object, p);

	switch (object) {

	case 6702: Teleport(3565, 3289, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6703: Teleport(3575, 3298, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 
	case 6704: Teleport(3577, 3283, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6705: Teleport(3565, 3276, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 
	case 6706: Teleport(3553, 3282, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6707: Teleport(3556, 3298, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 

	case 6823: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) {
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedVeracs) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedVeracs) { 
			spawnBrother("Veracs");
		}
		break;

	case 6821: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedAhrims) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedAhrims) {
			spawnBrother("Ahrims");
		}
		break;

	case 6772: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedTorag) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedTorag) {
			spawnBrother("Torags");
		}
		break;

	case 6822: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedKarils) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedKarils) {
			spawnBrother("Karils");
		}
		break;

	case 6773: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedGuthans) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedGuthans) {
			spawnBrother("Guthans");
		}
		break;

	case 6771: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel();
		} else if(killedDharok) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedDharok) {
			spawnBrother("Dharok");
		}
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public client c;
public int dialogue = 0;
	public int barrowsMGKC, randomInterface;
public boolean sendNPcText;
	public boolean killedKarils, killedGuthans, killedDharok, killedTorag, killedAhrims, killedVeracs;

}[/code][/quote]If that is really yours, why did you just post it?

  1. I don’t want it?
  2. People are gonna leech your code now…

Read full topic

public void displayHiddenTunnel() 
{
	if(dialogue == 0) {
		sendFrame164(363);
		sendQuest("", 364);

}

	{

	case 952:
		if(inCoords(3554, 3294, 3560, 3300)) {
			spadeTeleport("Veracs");
		} else if(inCoords(3573, 3295, 3578, 3300)) {
			spadeTeleport("Dharok"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3563, 3285, 3567, 3291)) {
			spadeTeleport("Ahrims");
		} else if(inCoords(3563, 3273, 3568, 3278)) {
			spadeTeleport("Karils"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3575, 3280, 3580, 3284)) {
			spadeTeleport("Guthans"); 
		} else if(inCoords(3551, 3280, 3556, 3285)) {
			spadeTeleport("Torags"); 
		}
		c.startAnimation(830);
		c.updateRequired = true;
		c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void chest(int object, int p) 
{
	switch (object) 
	{

	case 10284:
	if(barrowsMGKC > 5) {
		if(misc.random(5) == 1) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(400));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(600));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(10000));
		} else if(misc.random(5) == 2) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(700));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(100));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(3000));
	    		c.addItem(barrowReward(), 1);
		} else if(misc.random(5) == 3) {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(20));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(300));
	    		c.addItem(995, misc.random(900));
	    		c.addItem(barrowReward(), 1);
 		} else {
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(900));
	    		c.addItem(randomRunes(), misc.random(1200));
	    		c.addItem(4740, misc.random(600));
	 		}
			finishBarrows();
		} else { 
			spawnLastBrother(p); 
		}
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void barrowDoors(int object, int p) 
{

	if(randomInterface >= 5) {
		c.showInterface(4543);
		randomInterface = 0;
	}

	switch (object) {

	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public void barrowObjects(int object, int p) 
{
	chest(object, p); barrowDoors(object, p);

	switch (object) {

	case 6702: Teleport(3565, 3289, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6703: Teleport(3575, 3298, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 
	case 6704: Teleport(3577, 3283, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6705: Teleport(3565, 3276, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 
	case 6706: Teleport(3553, 3282, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break;
	case 6707: Teleport(3556, 3298, 0); writeBarrowsI(false); break; 

	case 6823: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) {
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedVeracs) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedVeracs) { 
			spawnBrother("Veracs");
		}
		break;

	case 6821: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedAhrims) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedAhrims) {
			spawnBrother("Ahrims");
		}
		break;

	case 6772: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedTorag) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedTorag) {
			spawnBrother("Torags");
		}
		break;

	case 6822: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedKarils) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedKarils) {
			spawnBrother("Karils");
		}
		break;

	case 6773: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel(); break;
		} else if(killedGuthans) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedGuthans) {
			spawnBrother("Guthans");
		}
		break;

	case 6771: 
		if(barrowsMGKC >= 5) { 
			displayHiddenTunnel();
		} else if(killedDharok) { 
			c.sendMessage("You've already summoned this barrow brother."); 
			break; 
		} else if(!killedDharok) {
			spawnBrother("Dharok");
		}
		break;
	}
	client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
}

public client c;
public int dialogue = 0;
	public int barrowsMGKC, randomInterface;
public boolean sendNPcText;
	public boolean killedKarils, killedGuthans, killedDharok, killedTorag, killedAhrims, killedVeracs;

}[/code]
